DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose study evaluate impact percutaneous closure patent foramen ovale ( hole heart ) , use AMPLATZER PFO Occluder , incidence migraine headache .

DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnose migraine headache without aura Have Patent Foramen Ovale ( PFO ) A migraine history show refractoriness medical treatment Willing participate followup visit Subjects whose primary headache migraine headache Who overuse migraine treatment With clinical history stroke Transient Ischemic Attack ( TIA ) With contraindication aspirin therapy Clopidogrel Pregnant desire become pregnant within next year
